name: Trapped In TARP
description:
Trapped in TARP is a thrilling interactive story of survival deep underground set in 1981 in the residential Chicago suburb of Thornton, on the eve of a major storm in the area. While walking back home, you are accosted by a pair of teenagers and asked to help them find their lost dog. It has run into a nearby drainage tunnel construction project, and the teenagers are continually  getting more and more worried. It occurs to you that you may have to traverse these dark tunnels in order to help them, but begin to hear the storm picking up around you.

Creators: Kathleen Birk, Madeline Burrell, Joseph Chavero, and Nicholas Worden
